sentences.en: By the common law of England, misprision of felony or treason was a crime of omission.
sentences.cn: 根据英国普通法, 对于重罪或叛国罪知情不举是不作为的犯罪行为.

words.tran_cn: 渎职；蔑视；玩忽职守；[法]知情不报

trans.tran_cn: （公职人员的）玩忽职守，渎职，包庇罪行，蔑视政府（或法庭）
trans.tran_en: a failure to inform the proper authorities of the commission of an act of treason
